div.span: Buildings Are Closed, but Learning Remains Constant!

span.div: Online learning started for all K-12 students on April 1, 2020, and will continue through the end of the 2019-2020 School Year.
All School Buildings are closed until further notice.

td.a: Western Area Career and Technology Center
Echolocation Art: An Encore of International Study

span.div:
McGuffey School District is a public school system located in Washington County, Pennsylvania. The School District is composed of four schools: McGuffey High School, McGuffey Middle School, Claysville Elementary, and Joe Walker Elementary.
The McGuffey school colors are navy blue and gold. "Highlanders" has been adopted as the official school nickname. Current enrollment is approximately 1,600 students. The district is named after William Holmes McGuffey, who wrote a series of Eclectic Readers and was a famous and revolutionary educator. McGuffey School District covers an area of approximately 198 square miles sparsely populated by 12,480 people in 4,949 households.
Mission Statement
In partnership with our community, McGuffey School District empowers all learners to grow and excel.
McGuffey School District is a progressive district cultivating continuous learning through multiple experiences and pathways.

br.span: The revised 2019-2020 District Calendar was presented to the Board on April 16, 2020, and approved on April 21, 2020. Graduation for the Class of 2020 has been set for Friday, June 5, 2020.

img.div: This communication was delivered via phone to all families with current contact information in our student information system. If you did not receive a phone call regarding this information and need to update the contact information we have on file, please email Ms. Jodi White at [email protected], or you may always contact office staff in your children's schools.
(Ms. Carman: [email protected] or Ms. Six: [email protected])

img.a: McG Technology Department Opens Up the Student Help Desk

br.span: McGuffey School District is now providing a process for students to get repairs done on distict provided computing devices. Click Here to see how you can contact the Help Desk if you are experiencing issues with your district owned device.

div.a: Free Grab & Go Meals Now Offered at McGuffey Middle School/High School Cafeteria Door #32

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Due to traffic and the number of meals being served, starting on April 6, 2020, we are moving our food distribution site to McGuffey MS/HS Cafeteria on Mondays and Thursdays from 11:30 a.m. through 1:00 p.m. (These are the same days and times of food distribution we were previously offering at Joe Walker Elementary School.) Families should use the bus lane and remain in their vehicles at all times. Free meals are given for all children 18 and younger and cover multiple days between meal distributions.

div.a: Governor Tom Wolf Asks All Pennsylvanians to Wear Masks When Leaving the House

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
span.img: Staying at home orders remain in effect and is the best way to reduce the spread of COVID-19. However,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Governor Wolf recently announced that if you have to go out for life-sustaining reasons, all Pennsylvanians should wear a cloth mask.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Please continue to stay home. Stay calm. Stay safe.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Additional information from the Department of Health is provided.
